data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Qaraghandy. Through your servants plant 272 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 7,994 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,355,606 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 170 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 7,994 believers in Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 7,994 believers living in the state of Qaraghandy. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Chechen people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, grace the churches in Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan has a population of 1,363,600.

We estimate Qaraghandy has 7,994 people who might know Jesus, 178,250 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,177,356 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 170 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Qaraghandy, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
